Title.language: Doxology for St. Gregory the Theologian
Doksologi untuk St. Gregory Sang Teolog

comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Gregory the Theologian:
Untuk Peringatan St. Gregory Sang Teolog:

text.language: Gregory of Nazianzus: O great shepherd: the luminous pillar: of the Orthodox people.

div.div: Gregorius dari Nazianzus: Oh gembala agung: tiang terang yang menuntun umat Ortodoks.

text.language: O great Archbishop: of Constantinople: you authored the liturgy: with the sweetness of your words.

language.div: Ya Uskup Agung yang hebat: dari Konstantinopel, yang tulis liturgi penuh keindahan dengan manisnya kata-katamu.

text.language: His father, a bishop: by heresies was led astray: but returned to the true faith: through his son, Saint Gregory.

language.div: Ayahnya, seorang uskup: pernah tersesat ajaran sesat: namun kembali ke iman yang benar: melalui putranya, Santo Gregorius.

text.language: With your holy sayings: concerning the Trinity: you rebuked the heretics: and corrected their false teachings.

language.div: Dengan kalimatmu yang suci tentang Tritunggal Mahakudus: kau tegur para bidat: luruskan ajaran sesat mereka.

text.language: Blessed are you indeed: our holy father the patriarch: Abba Gregory the Theologian: the beloved of Christ.

language.div: Diberkatilah kau: ya Bapa patriark kami yang kudus: Abba Gregorius sang Teolog: kekasih Kristus.
